attributes.action: Leave the 1951 Refugee Convention and 1967 Protocol & revoke the Immigration Act
attributes.additional_details: We also ask that the Government revoke the Immigration Act as we believe that this legislation will not help to accomplish the goals that were outlined by the Government's manifesto.
attributes.background: The 1951 Refugee Convention and its 1967 Protocol were introduced in an era where such agreements were needed, but we believe that they are no longer fit for purpose.
